title: Chickpea and cucumber salad
description: This salad will really cut through the fat of rich dishes, such as roast lamb, perfectly.

default: 1 cucumber, seeds removed, chopped into 1cm/½in cubes

steps: Drain and rinse the chickpeas and place in a bowl. Add the cucumber, herbs, chilli and red onion.
Gently toss to combine. Season with lemon juice, salt and pepper, to taste.
